tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crime_statistics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  neighborhood_name VARCHAR(50),
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  crime_date DATE,
  crime_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crime_data (crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_description TEXT,
    neighborhood VARCHAR,
    crime_date DATE,
    crime_time TIME)

CREATE TABLE neighborhood_stats (neighborhood_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    neighborhood_name VARCHAR,
    average_crime_rate FLOAT,
    total_crimes_reported INT,
    most_common_crime VARCHAR)

CREATE TABLE Crimes (
    crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date_reported DATE,
    neighborhood_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (neighborhood_id) REFERENCES Neighborhoods(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Suspects (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    neighborhood_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (neighborhood_id) REFERENCES Neighborhoods(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Witnesses (
    witness_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    statement TEXT,
    crime_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES Crimes(crime_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Crimes (
 crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 crime_type VARCHAR(50),
 crime_date DATE,
 neighborhood_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (neighborhood_id) REFERENCES Neighborhoods(neighborhood_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Criminals (
 criminal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 criminal_name VARCHAR(50),
 criminal_age INT,
 crime_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES Crimes(crime_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Victims (
 victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 victim_name VARCHAR(50),
 victim_age INT,
 crime_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES Crimes(crime_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Witnesses (
 witness_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 witness_name VARCHAR(50),
 witness_contact VARCHAR(20),
 crime_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES Crimes(crime_id)
);
